thread.title: Location, location and yes a cool hotel!
thread.title_full: Location, location and yes a cool hotel! - Review of Hyatt Place New York Midtown South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: elmoro
title: Location, location and yes a cool hotel!
text:
Stayed in this great hotel for a few nights as a result of the great storm that pummeled New York in early February.
Great convenient free bfast typical of many other hotels with cereals, hot items and others. Found the dining area a bit on the crowded side with many guests in town apparently but not a major issue. Never ran out of food and there was always a place to sit.
Excellent location close to anything in Manhattan with Uber, subway stations or taxis. Walked all over the place and the hotel was in the right spot. Nearby coffee shops and restaurants.
Friendly staff and great modern decor.
Room and bathroom was rather "large" for NY standards and enjoyed the street view I happened to have.
Really can't go wrong with this place and if you get a good rate, cannot beat it.
